entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
